content.question: The current in the circuit shown above is <math alttext="I" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following correctly expresses the sum of the electric potential differences around the loop?

choices.label: <math alttext="negative script E sub 1, plus script E sub 2, plus I R sub 1, minus I R sub 2, equals 0" overflow="scroll"><msub><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>Ɛ</mi></mrow><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi><mi>R</mi></mrow><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi><mi>R</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

<math alttext="negative script E sub 1, minus script E sub 2, minus I R sub 1, plus I R sub 2, equals 0" overflow="scroll"><msub><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>Ɛ</mi></mrow><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi><mi>R</mi></mrow><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi><mi>R</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

<math alttext="script E sub 1, plus script E sub 2, minus I R sub 1, minus I R sub 2, equals 0" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><mi>I</mi><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><mi>I</mi><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

<math alttext="script E sub 1, minus script E sub 2, minus I R sub 1, minus I R sub 2, equals 0" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><mi>I</mi><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><mi>I</mi><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="script E sub 1, minus script E sub 2, minus I R sub 1, minus I R sub 2, equals 0" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><mi>I</mi><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><mi>I</mi><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
